full_output.summary: Highly motivated B.Tech student with a strong analytical background and proficiency in programming. Seeking a data analytics internship to apply academic knowledge, gain practical experience.

projects.name: E commerce Sales Analysis
projects.description: Conducted a data-driven project in Excel, where I analyzed sales data to identify key trends and actionable insights. This project resulted in data-backed recommendations to optimize online sales strategies, enhancing decision-making and business performance. Demonstrated proficiency in data manipulation, pivot tables, and advanced Excel functions.

projects.name: Food Store Sales Insights Project using SQL
projects.description: Developed a SQL-based sales store database to streamline inventory management, track sales performance, and generate detailed reports. Leveraged SQL queries to optimize data retrieval, enabling efficient decision-making and operational improvements.

projects.name: Sales Assessment Project Using Power BI
projects.description: Created a sales analytics dashboard using Power BI to visualize performance metrics and track sales trends. Utilized advanced data visualization techniques to provide clear insights into key sales drivers, supporting data-driven decision-making. Demonstrated strong skills in data modeling, DAX, and report customization for enhanced business reporting.

projects.name: Online Sales Evaluation
projects.description: Conducted exploratory data analysis with Python to reveal trends and insights. Utilized libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib to clean, analyze, and visualize data. Demonstrated proficiency in statistical analysis and data interpretation to support data-driven decision-making.

experiences.description: During my data analytics internship, I honed my skills in Python, Excel, data visualization, and data cleaning. I worked on various projects, transforming raw data into actionable insights and creating visually compelling dashboards.

Assisted in analyzing large datasets, uncovering insights, and creating data-driven reports using Excel, Python, and SQL. Streamlined data processes for efficiency, developed visualizations, and supported decision-making by presenting key findings to stakeholders.
